title: Config
description: The schema for the config JSON used by twitch2ma

timeout.description: The cooldown time in seconds between the execution of any command (prevents flooding/spamming). Does not apply to moderators and channel owners.

host.description: The IP address of the desk to connect to.

user.description: The GrandMA 2 user to log in with.

password.description: The password for the user defined in 'ma.user'.

twitch.description: The config for the Twitch connection.

clientId.description: The client ID obtained by Twitch.

accessToken.description: The access token obtained by Twitch.

channel.description: The Twitch channel the bot connects to.

commands.description: An array of commands the bot reacts to.

chatCommand.description: The command viewers need to use in chat without '!'. The command 'lights' is reserved for viewer help.

consoleCommand.description: The command that gets executed on the desk.

message.description: A message that is sent to Twitch chat when the command was executed on the desk. '{user}' is replaced by the user who issued the command.

help.description: A help message that is sent to Twitch when viewers run the command '!lights !<command>'. '{parameterList}' is replaced by a list of available parameters if any.

parameters.description: An array of parameters for each command so viewers can call '!<command> <parameter>'.

parameter.description: The parameter to append to the command.

consoleCommand.description: The command that gets executed on the desk when using the parameter.

message.description: A message that is sent to Twitch chat when the parameter was executed on the desk. '{user}' gets replaced by the user who issued the command.
